casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Patrick MYLETT 6A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 18, 2019

W. Rob Heroy, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, For Mylett, Pat

Matthew W. Sawchak, Solicitor General, Ryan Y. Park, James W. Doggett, Deputy Solicitors General, Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina

Noell P. Tin, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, For Pennsylvania Center for the First Amendment *882The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 13th of March 2019 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of March 2019."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 10th day of May 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
